data.title: Bus from Paris to Göttingen
data.meta_description: Discover bus trips from Paris to Göttingen ✔ Secure online payment ✔ Free Wi-Fi and power outlets on board ✔ E-Ticket available ✔ One check-in baggage and one carry-on included ✔ Get your bus tickets now.
data.text:
Find the cheapest buses from Paris to Göttingen

Getting from Paris to Göttingen is cheap and easy when you travel with FlixBus. The two cities are 511 miles apart and traveling between the two takes as fast as 12 hours 35 minutes.

FlixBus tickets are always good value, but you can save even more money by booking online in advance. Book on the website or our FlixBus App in minutes, then simply use your phone as your ticket to board the bus.

Bus tickets between Paris and Göttingen cost $43.99 on average, but you can get tickets for as low as $32.99 if you book in advance and/or outside of busy travel times, like weekends and holidays.

For a quick, easy and environmentally-conscious choice, travel with FlixBus.

We have a large network of destinations, so you can trust us to take you from your desired departure city to your destination in comfort and style - all for great value.

Traveling from Paris to Göttingen

It's easy to get from Paris to Göttingen with FlixBus, with 13 direct buses per day. The first bus is at 12:25 am and the last bus leaves at 11:40 pm, giving you options to suit every schedule.

You can expect a minimum of 10 stops on your journey. It can take a minimum time of 12 hours 35 minutes.

Bus travel is the most environmentally friendly way to travel long distances and we're working to make it even greener with high environmental standards across our fleet of buses, the use of alternative drive and fuel technologies, and the option for all passengers to offset their carbon emissions at the point of buying a ticket.

The average cost of bus travel between Paris and Göttingen is $43.99, which makes bus travel far cheaper than any other method.

Taking the bus from Paris

Traveling from Paris and not familiar with it? Here's everything you need to know.

Paris is a transport hub with 14 bus station(s); the 422 connections departing from Paris every day take travelers both within the state and further afield.

Arriving in Göttingen

Traveling to Göttingen for the first time? Here's what you need to know:

Göttingen is very well connected to other destinations on the FlixBus network, with 82 connections arriving in one of the 1 bus station(s) of the city, giving you easy access to all corners of the country.
